short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension decodes Base64-encoded strings on right-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Contextual Decoding: Right-click to decode any selected Base64-encoded string on the page you're viewing.

Full Page Decoding: Use the extension button to decode and replace all Base64-encoded strings across the entire webpage.

Safe and Secure: Performs decoding locally, ensuring your data remains private and secure.
